app.name: WithGod
app.tagline: Unite in prayer, strengthen in faith

auth.begin_journey: Begin your journey with believers worldwide
auth.already_account: Already blessed with an account? Sign In
auth.new_family: New to our prayer family? Join Us

home.title: How shall we pray together today?
home.request_description: Share your heart with our loving community of believers
home.soldier_description: Commit to prayer time and help maintain 24/7 global coverage
home.healing_description: Join thousands in praying for healing and restoration across our world. Together, our prayers create waves of hope and divine intervention.
home.verse_matthew: Again, truly I tell you that if two of you on earth agree about anything they ask for, it will be done for them by my Father in heaven.

requests.title: Share Your Prayer Request
requests.subtitle: Our global community of prayer warriors is ready to lift you up in faith and love
requests.promise_description: Your prayer requests are treated with divine love, complete confidentiality, and profound respect. Our prayer soldiers commit to praying for each request with compassion and unwavering faith.
requests.name_placeholder: Enter your name or leave blank to remain anonymous
requests.name_hint: 💝 Many choose to share their name to build deeper community connections
requests.heart_placeholder: Share what's weighing on your heart. Our prayer warriors will lift you up in prayer with divine love and unwavering faith. Be as specific or general as you feel comfortable sharing...
requests.heart_hint: 🙏 The more you share, the more specifically we can intercede for you in prayer
requests.submission_message: Your prayer request has been shared with our prayer community. Our prayer warriors are already lifting you up in prayer. May God bless you abundantly.
requests.verse_philippians: Do not be anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

soldier.title: Prayer Soldier
soldier.subtitle: Join the elite 24/7 prayer coverage army
soldier.committed_time: You're committed to daily prayer at this sacred time
soldier.time_description: Commit to daily prayer (minimum 2 minutes) and help maintain our global prayer coverage. Join the elite force of prayer soldiers.
soldier.missions_description: These believers need your prayers right now. Join the mission to lift them up.
soldier.verse_thessalonians: Pray continually, give thanks in all circumstances; for this is God's will for you in Christ Jesus.

profile.currently_praying_desc: You are currently in prayer. Notifications are paused during your sacred time.
profile.test_notification_desc: Preview the beautiful angel notification that appears during prayer times to guide your spiritual journey
profile.verse_romans: Be joyful in hope, patient in affliction, faithful in prayer.
profile.sign_out_confirm: Are you sure you want to sign out of WithGod?

prayer_session.title: Sacred Prayer Session
prayer_session.take_moment: Take a moment to pray, then swipe to continue
prayer_session.session_message: You prayed for {count} requests in {duration} minutes. May God bless your faithful prayers and may His peace be with you.
prayer_session.end_session_confirm: Are you sure you want to end your prayer session?
prayer_session.begin_mission_desc: Start your prayer time with the current prayer requests from our global community?

notifications.test_message: 🙏 Test Prayer Notification - May God bless you
notifications.take_moment: Take a moment to connect with God

welcome.verse_james: The prayer of a righteous person is powerful and effective.
welcome.welcome_description: You're now part of a global family of prayer warriors committed to lifting each other up in faith, hope, and love.
welcome.blessing: ✨ May God's grace guide your every prayer 🙏

language.restart_required: Please restart the app to apply language changes
